data.expected_result: channel order should be reverted to one from before starting to move channel
data.short_description: app crash if you try to back from channel sorting [virtual navigation buttons only]
data.steps_to_repro: - On a server you have Manage channels perms- Go to Channels, click the Sort icon and choose Text channel mode.- Hold any channel and move it around. Keep holding it, do NOT release it yet.- Press the Back button of your Android device **while you are still holding the channel**
